bibl.title: Papyri from Tebtunis in Egyptian and in Greek (P. Tebt. Tait).

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Texts from Excavations.

bibl.note: P. Tebt. Tait. - Demotic Texts (Nos 1-23). - Hieratic Texts (Nos 24-34). - Hieroglyphic Texts (Nos 35-37). - Greek Texts (Nos 38-53).
bibl.seg: Tait William John, Papyri from Tebtunis in Egyptian and in Greek (P. Tebt. Tait). (Egypt Exploration Society. Texts from Excavations. 3.)
London, E.E.S., 1977, 4Â°, xvi-118 pp. et 12 pll.
P. Tebt. Tait. - Demotic Texts (Nos 1-23). - Hieratic Texts (Nos 24-34). - Hieroglyphic Texts (Nos 35-37). - Greek Texts (Nos 38-53).

C.R. par Mark Smith, JEA 69 (1983) pp. 199-203. - H. De Meulenaere, ChrEg 55 (1980) Nos 109-110, pp. 119-120. - S. Grunert, OLZ 76 (1981) coll. 545-546. - W. Brunsch, Enchoria 8 (1978) pp. 101-104. - R. Holton Pierce, BibO 36 (1979) pp. 319-320. - J. Irigoin, RPhil 3e s., 53 (1979) p. 146. - J. O'Callaghan, Orientalia N.S., 48 (197) pp. 285-286.
